subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Miami shut out the Mets for the second consecutive game, winning with a sacrifice fly in the ninth, and the Mets pitchers’ woes at bat continued: They are 0 for 58 this year.
snippet: Miami shut out the Mets for the second consecutive game, winning with a sacrifice fly in the ninth, and the Mets pitchers’ woes at bat continued: They are 0 for 58 this year.
